name: All-Ways Up
description:
In a world where the ground is no longer safe, humanity faces a mysterious challenge: the constant need to move their homes ever higher. Dive into "AllWaysUp", an engaging Jump and Run adventure that not only tests your reflexes but also unravels a captivating story of survival, mystery, and ascent.

Key Features:

Elevated Gameplay: Master the art of jumping and running as you navigate through intricate levels, each designed to challenge your skills and reflexes.

A World Above: Discover the reasons behind the world's peculiar shift. Why must everyone move upwards? Unravel the mystery as you climb.

Narrative-driven Experience: This isn't just a game; it's a story. Engage with memorable characters and witness their struggles and triumphs in this ever-ascending world.

Support a Greater Cause: By diving into this side project, you're directly supporting the development of my main game. Every jump you make, every story twist you uncover, brings us one step closer to our primary vision.

Join us in this vertical journey and help me elevate my dreams to new heights!
